data.title: Kate del Castillo Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Kate del Castillo with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

The daughter of a telenovela actor, Eric del Castillo, she rose to fame on her own telenovela, Muchachitas

Won a 1995 TVyNovelas Award for her work on Imperio de cristal

In 2009, became a L'Oreal spokesperson

Was appointed an ambassador for the Mexican Commissioner on Human Rights in 2009

Wrote a public letter, via Twitter, to the Mexican drug lord El Chapo in 2012; she later negotiated a meeting between El Chapo and Sean Penn, for an article the actor wrote for Rolling Stone
